compute_mock module¶

compute_mock.compute(halo_file, env_file, header_file, output_file, siglogM=None, logMmin=None, logM0=None, logM1=None, alpha=None, q_env=None, del_gamma=None, f_cen=None, A_conc=None, delta_b=None, delta_c=None, R_rescale=None, is_stochastic=None, seed=None)[source]¶
compute_mock.compute_HOD_parameters(ngal=None, M1_over_Mmin=None, M0_over_M1=None, alpha=None, siglogM=None, f_cen=None, halos=None, header=None, mass_fun_file=None, logMmin_guess=13.2)[source]¶

Compute the physical (er, Msun h^-1) HOD parameters from ratios of masses and the desired number density of galaxies. We convert the number density of galaxies into Mmin using the halo mass function.

compute_mock.compute_HOD_parameters_centralsonly(ncen=None, siglogM=None, f_cen=None, halos=None, header=None, mass_fun_file=None, logMmin_guess=13.5)[source]¶
